reviewText:
This video gave my mother's best friend's daughter seizures. Not cool.

That's Cruel for Budget's stanards, Not just that, it's harmful!

Save your money.

Signed,
Charles Loftus IV

In the spirit of screensavers with gold fish swimming, or with a roaring fire that appears on your screen, here is a flashing, throbbing strobe light that emanates from your television when placed in your DVD player. Drew's Famous strobe light is an awesome gift, especially if you know someone named Drew who has a sense of humor.
